biotools.summary: Predict binding of peptides to MHC class II molecules. The predictions are available for all three human MHC class II isotypes, HLA-DR, HLA-DP and HLA-DQ, as well as mouse molecules.

bioschemas.name: NetMHCIIpan
bioschemas.summary: Predict binding of peptides to MHC class II molecules. The predictions are available for all three human MHC class II isotypes, HLA-DR, HLA-DP and HLA-DQ, as well as mouse molecules.
